displayName: Ensure AWS EBS volumes are encrypted
rationale: Amazon EC2 EBS volumes should be encrypted to prevent unwatned usage. For more information, visit https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/EBSEncryption.html.
recommended_action: EBS Volumes, once created, cannot be encrypted later. For information on how to move unencrypted snapshots to encrypted EBS volumes, visit https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/EBSEncryption.html#encryption-examples.
error_message: AWS EC2 EBS Volume is not encrypted
ruleNames: AWS EC2 EBS volumes should be encrypted
